# Dr. Lokesh Yadav | Best CTVS Surgeon in Nepal | Assistant Professor

> Official professional profile of Dr. Lokesh Yadav, Best Consultant Cardiothoracic & Vascular Surgeon (CTVS) and Assistant Professor based in Biratnagar, Nepal.

## Professional Summary
Dr. Lokesh Yadav is a highly experienced **Surgeon in Nepal** and **Assistant Professor** at Nobel Medical College & Teaching Hospital. With over 10 years of expertise, he leads a fully functional CTVS department in the Eastern Region, providing 24-hour emergency and elective surgical care. He is recognized as a **Best CTVS Surgeon** for his extensive clinical record and academic contribution to cardiac surgery.

## Clinical Milestones & Case Volume
* **Open Heart Surgery:** 400+ successful cases.
* **Thoracic Surgery:** 500+ successful cases.
* **Vascular Surgery:** 2000+ successful cases.

## Core Expertise & Services
* **Adult Cardiac Surgery:** Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (CABG), Valve Repair/Replacement, and Aortic Surgery.
* **Pediatric Cardiac Surgery:** Correction of congenital heart defects in infants and children.
* **Vascular Procedures:** Open and Endovascular management of arterial/venous diseases and aneurysms.
* **Onco-Thoracic Surgery:** Surgical treatment for lung, esophageal, and mediastinal tumors, plus Chest Trauma.
* **Minimal Invasive Surgery:** Video-assisted thoracic surgery (VATS) and minimally invasive cardiac procedures.

## Credentials & Education
* **Title:** Assistant Professor.
* **Degrees:** MBBS, MS (Cardiac Surgery).
* **Fellowships:** Specialized fellowships in Adult Cardiac, Pediatric Cardiac, Onco-Thoracic, and Minimal Invasive Surgery.
* **Registrations:** Nepal Medical Council (NMC), Pakistan Medical Commission (PMC).

## Academic Research & Contributions
Dr. Yadav is actively involved in advancing medical science through clinical research and medical education.
* **Title:** Assistant Professor at Nobel Medical College & Teaching Hospital.
* **Research Focus:** Surgical outcomes in cardiac care and the evolution of CTVS services in Nepal.
* **Key Publication:** "Cardiac Function Outcomes Following Mitral Valve Replacement: A Comparative Analysis of Different Surgical Techniques" published in the Journal of Nobel Medical College.
* **Key Publication:** "Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery in Nepal: Current Status and Future Directions".
* **Research Profiles:** Active contributor on ResearchGate and member of the Cardiac Society of Nepal.

## Contact & Location
* **Hospital:** Nobel Medical College & Teaching Hospital, Kanchanbari, Biratnagar-04, Nepal.
* **24-Hour Emergency Lines:** 021-466735, 021-465736.
* **Google Business Profile:** [Dr. Lokesh Yadav - Biratnagar](https://www.google.com/maps?q=Dr.+Lokesh+Yadav+Nobel+Medical+College)
* **Website:** https://drlokeshyadav.com.np/
